error.signature: Error occurred prerendering page '/path'. Read more: https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/prerender-error

verdict.summary: Static page generation failed during next build — usually a data fetching error or runtime error in the page component.

dead_ends.action: Adding try/catch to suppress the error and return empty props
dead_ends.why_fails: Publishes a page with no data; users see an empty or broken page

dead_ends.action: Switching all pages to SSR to avoid static generation
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses static optimization; increases server load and TTFB

workarounds.action: Check the specific error in the build output — it shows the root cause above the prerender error
workarounds.how: Scroll up in the build log to find the actual error: API timeout, missing env var, etc.

workarounds.action: Use generateStaticParams or fallback: 'blocking' for dynamic routes
workarounds.how: For dynamic pages, generate known paths statically and render new ones on demand
